manifesto.title: The story
manifesto.description: Originally from a small town in rural Catalonia and after +1.5 years in Norway working as an iOS developer & Concept Designer, while graduating from Electronic Engineering, I’m up to new challenges and new stories.

manifesto.title: The manifesto
manifesto.description: When I get asked to describe the work I do, I keep on thinking. I do what what makes you think. The prototype that makes you win. The design that makes you wow. Welcome to my site. I’m Ramon. It’s nice to have you here.

manifesto.title: The awards
manifesto.description: Working together requires trust. Being selected among 300 developers to attend the 2015 Apple's WWDC, A top 3 student award in Electronic Engineering and the recognition as the best thesis in University guarantees that trust.
